restaurant.name: Russ & Daughters Cafe

restaurant.name: 99 Favor Taste

restaurant.name: Wayan
restaurant.desc: French-accented Indonesian menu created by celebrated chef Jean-Georges' son Cédric Vongerichten is served in a sleek setting.

restaurant.desc: Filipino-Thai-accented SE Asian fare & specialty drinks served in modern, stylish digs with a patio.

shop.desc: Secondhand store packed with clothing, shoes & accessories from past decades at budget prices.

shop.name: Ludlow Flea
